column4: I installed Ubuntu Server (LTS 10.04) on a ProLiant Server,  Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E5430  @ 2.66GHz, but in /proc/cpuinfo it shows cpu MHz : 2003.000, is there some energy saving there I need to turn off?
Okay look, as soon as your system will *need* the full CPU speed, it'll use it -- so why bother :/
